DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study verify superior efficacy Z-338 placebo subject Functional Dyspepsia , focus assessment subjective symptom .
DOC.brief_title: To Verify Efficacy Z-338 Subjects With Functional Dyspepsia
DOC.criteria: Subjects show least one 4 symptom ( upper abdominal pain , upper abdominal discomfort , epigastric pain , epigastric burning ) least 6 month obtain informed consent Subjects show two follow symptom : upper abdominal pain , upper abdominal discomfort , postprandial fullness , upper abdominal bloating , early satiety , nausea , vomit and/or excessive belching least 3 month ( one postprandial fullness early satiation ) Bothersome symptoms postprandial fullness , upper abdominal bloat early satiety time obtain informed consent Subjects structural disease likely explain symptom ( e.g. , GERD , erosion , ulcer , hiatal hernia , bleeding , malignancy Barrett 's esophagus ) confirm upper endoscopy obtain informed consent Subjects heartburn last 12 week obtain informed consent Subjects irritable bowel disease ( IBS ) Subjects diabetes mellitus require treatment Subjects serious anxiety disorder Subjects depression and/or sleep disorder Subjects biliary tract disease and/or pancreatitis ( include chronic pancreatitis )
